descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Cracked Johnnie][color=#1e84cc][size=6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59629]The mod was updated and integrated with another[/url][/size][/color][/font][/center]
[size=+3][color=lightblue][font=AR DARLING]Wolfgun - its my first follower mod for Skyrim, the mod added new nps, I named him Wolfgun.
He Nord, master-handed weapon, it is possible to get married.
You can find him in Whiterun in Bannered Mare.
I Recommend use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037/?]UFO[/url] with my mod[/font][/color][/size]
author: Jack9807
